Interface GameManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
Game
public interface GameManager
The GameManager interface provides methods for interacting with the main game logic. It allows other classes to access game state information and manage turn progression.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addToFirePit(Card card)
    Adds a card to the fire pit (discard pile).
    Player
    getCurrentPlayer()
    Retrieves the player whose turn is currently active.
    int
    getCurrentPlayerIndex()
    Retrieves the index of the current player.

    Retrieves the current turn count in the game.
    boolean
    isGameOver()
    Checks if the game has ended.
    void
    nextTurn()
    Advances the game to the next player's turn.

  • Method Details

    • getTurn

      int getTurn()
      Retrieves the current turn count in the game.
      Returns:
      The current turn number.

    • getCurrentPlayerIndex

      int getCurrentPlayerIndex()
      Retrieves the index of the current player.
      Returns:
      The index of the current player in the list of players.

    • nextTurn

      void nextTurn()
      Advances the game to the next player's turn.

    • addToFirePit

      void addToFirePit(Card card)
      Adds a card to the fire pit (discard pile).
      Parameters:
      card - The Card to be added to the fire pit.

    • isGameOver

      boolean isGameOver()
      Checks if the game has ended.
      Returns:
      true if the game has ended, false otherwise.

    • getCurrentPlayer

      Player getCurrentPlayer()
      Retrieves the player whose turn is currently active.
      Returns:
      The current Player.
